name: Shared Shirt
description:
This NFT relates to a piece of augmented reality clothing. Being a fashion item, the AR filter is openly available to anyone because people need to be able to see you wearing your digital outfit. But the owners of the NFT have the ability to add their own text on one of the 9999 shirts contained in this single NFT.

Perform your PIN number in front of someone to activate your personalized version of the t-shirt.

Practical info on how to view the AR filter-effect, in which app the item currently resides and how it will be kept up-to-date in the future can be found here:

https://sndrv.com/sharedshirt
